title: T213-3, T206 color variation, T3 HOFer
author: fkw

posts.post_title: T213-3, T206 color variation, T3 HOFer
posts.post_content:
Hi, I have a few cards FOR SALE.

If interested in a card....First email gets card. 
Please email me at [url]frank@centuryoldcards.com[/url], and also leave a note here, thanks.
Postage and Insurance included in price.

PS. There might be a delay in replying back....I can only get online 1-2 times a week at best, sorry

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1919t213mowrey.jpg[/IMG]
1919 T213-3 Mike Mowrey
(horizontal wrinkle through hat/ear, otherwise nice)
SAVED

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1909t206kelleybr1.jpg[/IMG]
1909-11 T206 Joe Kelley
(unusual brownish background print error, should be bright red)
SAVED

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1911t3jennings.jpg[/IMG]
1911 T3 Hugh Jennings
(pinholes top and bottom otherwise fairly nice)
$250


Thanks,  Frank K. Ward
